name: Buckeye Crepes
short_description: Three delicate crepes filled with Nutella®, topped with toasted hazelnuts, Hershey’s® syrup and lightly dusted with powdered sugar.
long_description: Three delicate crepes filled with Nutella®, topped with toasted hazelnuts, Hershey’s® syrup and lightly dusted with powdered sugar.

name: Cherry Kijafa Crepes
short_description: A Danish favorite! Three delicate crepes filled and topped with Montmorencey cherries simmered in our Kijafa® wine sauce. Topped with a light dusting of powdered sugar.
long_description: A Danish favorite! Three delicate crepes filled and topped with Montmorencey cherries simmered in our Kijafa® wine sauce. Topped with a light dusting of powdered sugar.
